description: Mode Manager étape 5: Construction bottom-up et références. MANIFESTE_HOMEOS_V0, design tokens, Sullivan Validation UI. Reference: docs/04-homeos/PLAN_MODE_MANAGER.md, docs/02-sullivan/DÉTAILS_CONSTRUCTION_INTERFACE.md.

steps.description: Create docs/04-homeos/MANIFESTE_HOMEOS_V0.md. Content: title MANIFESTE_HOMEOS_V0, section INTENTION PRIMAIRE (quote: Construire une interface d'administration Studio pour Homeos - autoconstructive comme Aetherflow, pédagogique, brutaliste mais lisible, séparée des interfaces utilisateur). Section CONTRAINTES HCI FORTES: Navigation 3 niveaux max (Brainstorm > Back > Front > Deploy), Z-index stratifié (Sullivan UI > Studio > Interface utilisateur), Validation obligatoire à chaque étape, Fallback sur design principles. Extract intent from PRD_HOMEOS and docs/02-sullivan/DÉTAILS_CONSTRUCTION_INTERFACE.md. Markdown only, no code.
validation_criteria: File exists with INTENTION PRIMAIRE and CONTRAINTES HCI FORTES

steps.description: Create docs/04-homeos/design_tokens.yaml (or homeos/config/design_tokens.yaml). YAML with design tokens: colors (primary, secondary, background, text), typography (font_family, font_size_base), spacing (spacing_unit, e.g. 8), border_radius (e.g. 4). Structure: colors:, typography:, spacing:, border_radius:. Values can be placeholders (e.g. primary: '#2563eb'). Reference PRD_HOMEOS and docs/02-sullivan/SULLIVAN_WORKFLOW_IDEAL.md design tokens.

Create docs/04-homeos/SULLIVAN_VALIDATION_UI.md. Document the Sullivan Validation UI contract: purpose (overlay for validation, scoring, action buttons), z-index 10000 (sullivan_validation layer), integration point (Sullivan Studio UI). Optional: create homeos/construction/validation_ui.py with a stub class SullivanValidationUI with method render_overlay() that returns a placeholder string or dict describing the overlay. Reference docs/04-homeos/PLAN_MODE_MANAGER.md step 5 and construction_config z_index_layers sullivan_validation.
validation_criteria: SULLIVAN_VALIDATION_UI.md exists and describes overlay, z-index, integration
